item.description:
Hello all!

 

I have been requested to put together a open meditation for the community to share on 12-12-12 and 12-21-12. So, being the spirtiual believer I am I am happy to provide the following information.

On 12-12-12 at 12:00pm and 6:00pm and on

12-21-12 at 12:00pm and 6:00pm there will be one hour meditations, open to the public.

On each of these days the studio will also be open to the public all day for anyone wanting to have a quiet place to pray and meditate.

There is a lot to be said for the changes going on for the earth right now and all the energy shifting we are going through. I know I am not the only energy healer that has an excess amount of vibration coursing through their body. Sometimes I question what I am feeling and want to make it stop. Sometimes I am just in awe that I am open and sensitive enough to feel it so clearly. That being said I also want to share I have been given information on how to reduce the vibration down to a tolerable flow with new tools I have learned. I feel it is my duty to share it with others that are having experiences with too much energy also.

Anyone coming to the evening meditations will have the opportunity to hear more about the new tools I am going to share. We owe it to oursleves to slow down, we owe it to ours families and we owe it to this wonderful island home we call Earth. I hope to see you here for the celebration of dimensional change with meditation and prayer.

This is a requested $5 donation.

Love you all,

Sincerely,

Barb

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: World Meditation Day 12-21-12
